Environmental Science.name: Tidal Rhythms & Photosynthetic Wonders
Environmental Science.description: Explore the fascinating interplay of tides and the process of photosynthesis. This quiz delves into the cyclical nature of our oceans and the vital role plants play in sustaining life. Test your knowledge of these fundamental environmental concepts.

questions.text: What is produced during photosynthesis?
What force causes an ice cream cone to fly off of a spinning merry-go-round?
On average, what length of time passes between high tides?

Environmental Science.name: Scottish Flora, Fauna & Fails
Environmental Science.description: Journey through the natural heritage of Scotland and beyond. This quiz covers iconic Scottish emblems, diverse animal life, and a notorious environmental disaster.  Are you ready to test your knowledge of Scotland's natural world and a significant ecological event?

questions.text: What kind of animal is a peregrine?
Which of these plants is the national emblem of Scotland?
What is produced during photosynthesis?
Where did the Exxon Valdez run aground in March of 1989?
Which of these animals lays eggs?

Environmental Science.name: Echoes of the Exxon Valdez
Environmental Science.description: This quiz revisits key environmental concepts and a pivotal moment in ecological history.  From photosynthesis to tidal patterns and the impact of the Exxon Valdez oil spill, assess your understanding of these interconnected elements.

questions.text: What is produced during photosynthesis?
